modules.description: Provides testable instances for HTTP-related types such as status codes, methods, versions, request and response bodies, and cookies. Works with specific data structures from the Opium library to enable precise unit testing. Used to validate HTTP message components in test suites with Alcotest.

Provides functions to simulate HTTP requests, inspect responses, and assert expected outcomes in test scenarios. Works with request and response objects, status codes, and headers. Enables testing of route handlers, middleware, and error cases within Opium-based web applications.

Provides testable instances for HTTP-related types, enabling precise unit testing of Opium applications. Includes status codes, methods, versions, request and response bodies, and cookies, all integrated with Opium's data structures. Supports validation of HTTP message components within Alcotest test suites. Examples include checking response status, inspecting headers, and verifying cookie values.
